newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish new car registrations rise 52 pct in March.
newsitem.headline: Swedish new car registrations rise 52 pct in March.

text.p: Swedish new car registrations rose by 52 percent to 22,319 cars in March compared to the same month in 1996 when 14,686 new cars were registered, Statistics Sweden said on Tuesday.
For the year to date there had been a 39.9 percent increase in new car registrations from a year ago, Statistics Sweden said.
An increase of 12.0 percent was noted for lorries in March when a total of 1,811 new lorries were registered compared with 1,617 in March last year.
